scripts.build: npm run encode-data && tsc && npm run rollup && npm run terser
scripts.rollup: for p in ./lib/index.js ./lib/full.js; do rollup --external @smikhalevski/trie --input $p --file ${p%.js}-cjs.js --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve --plugin @rollup/plugin-json || exit 1; done
scripts.terser: for p in ./lib/index-cjs.js ./lib/full-cjs.js; do terser --compress --mangle toplevel --output $p -- $p || exit 1; done
scripts.publish-docs: [ -d ./docs ] && [[ ! $(git status --porcelain) ]] && branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && sha=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && t=$(mktemp -d) && cp -R ./docs/ $t && git checkout ghpages && ls -A | grep -wv .git | xargs rm -rf && cp -R $t/ . && git add . && git commit -m "Updated docs ($sha)" && git push && git checkout $branch
scripts.release-docs: npm run clean && npm run encode-data && npm run docs && npm run publish-docs
